forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 50. South southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk blankets Downtown San Francisco, the air whispers tales of a clear night ahead, with temperatures gently dipping toward a comfortable 50 degrees. A soft breeze meanders through the streets, barely a rustle, adding a touch of warmth to the early evening chill. The horizon showcases a delicate watercolor wash where the last vestiges of sunlight mingle with the emerging night sky, offering a serene view that hints at serenity.

Tomorrow promises to dawn bright and sunny, with a high close to 70 and a gentle cooling shift toward the afternoon. The prevailing light will bathe the city in warmth, inviting residents and visitors alike to step outside and embrace the day. Marine fog, a beloved companion of the Bay, will remain at bay, allowing for unobstructed vistas of both the Golden Gate Bridge and the skyline. As you contemplate attire, consider a light layer – perhaps a cozy sweater or a light jacket – making it easy to adapt as the day warms. With such promising weather, it is an ideal time to engage in leisurely strolls along the waterfront or explore one of the many charming neighborhoods that populate this vibrant city, relishing in the simple pleasures of the day as evening calls for a return home.
